comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: The failed AppVeyor build is somehow a daily build (not sure why). The failed tests there are already fixed by #4058 in master. But the release branch doesn't have the fix and hence those tests failed.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: The packaging failure in OSX is because it tried to create the package beta.3 with beta.3 powershell. It's not a real problem.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: Given that, I will merge this branch.
